00019         this->encoderPPR = config.read_int( sectionName, "ENCODER_PPR", 400 );

00026 void WheelEncoder::init() {
00027 
00028         LOG_ENCODER(DEBUG4) << "Setting encoder usage to feedback" << endl;
00029         MotorController::instance()->setEncoderUsage();
00030 
00031         LOG_ENCODER(DEBUG4) << "Setting the EncoderPPR" << endl;
00032         MotorController::instance()->setEncoderPPR(this->encoderPPR);
00033 
00034         LOG_ENCODER(DEBUG4) << "Setting encoder settings" << endl;
00035         MotorController::instance()->setEncoderCounter(MotorController::BothChannels,this->leftCountAbsolute);

00038 void WheelEncoder::sensorProcess() {
00039         int tmp1 = 0, tmp2 = 0;
00040         LOG_ENCODER(DEBUG4) << "Getting Absolute Encoder Values" << endl;
00041         MotorController::instance()->getAbsoluteEncoderCount(&(this->leftCountAbsolute), &(this->rightCountAbsolute));
00042         LOG_ENCODER(DEBUG4) << "Getting Relative Encoder Values" << endl;
00043         MotorController::instance()->getRelativeEncoderCount(tmp1,tmp2);
00044         this->leftCount += tmp1;
00045         this->rightCount += tmp2;
00046         LOG_ENCODER(DEBUG4) << "Getting Encoder Speed" << endl;
00047         MotorController::instance()->getEncoderSpeeds(this->leftEncoderSpeed, this->rightEncoderSpeed);
00048 
00049         LOG_ENCODER(DEBUG4) << "Encoder values in sensorProcess: LA " << this->leftCountAbsolute << " RA " << this->rightCountAbsolute << " L " << this->leftCount << " R " << this->rightCount << " LS " << this->leftEncoderSpeed << " RS " << this->rightEncoderSpeed << endl;
00050 }

00052 SensorData * WheelEncoder::getData() {
00053         EncoderData* data = new EncoderData(this->leftCount, this->rightCount, this->leftCountAbsolute, this->rightCountAbsolute, this->leftEncoderSpeed, this->rightEncoderSpeed);
00054         this->leftCount = 0;
00055         this->rightCount = 0;
00056         return data;
00057 }
